name: editions
description: Publish multiple editions for your JavaScript packages consistently and easily (e.g. source edition, esnext edition, es2015 edition)

1.1.0.name: editions
1.1.0.description: Publish multiple editions for your JavaScript packages consistently and easily (e.g. source edition, esnext edition, es2015 edition)

editions.description: Source + ESNext + Require + Flow Type Comments
Babel Compiled + ES2015 + Require

scripts.meta: npm run meta:docs && npm run meta:projectz
scripts.prepare: npm run compile && npm run test && npm run meta
scripts.release: npm run prepare && npm run release:tag && npm run release:push
scripts.release:push: git push origin master && git push origin --tags
scripts.pretest: npm run test:eslint && npm run test:flow

scripts.our:meta: npm run our:meta:docs && npm run our:meta:projectz
scripts.our:verify: npm run our:verify:eslint && npm run our:verify:flow
scripts.our:release: npm run our:release:prepare && npm run our:release:publish && npm run our:release:tag && npm run our:release:push
scripts.our:release:prepare: npm run our:clean && npm run our:compile && npm run our:test && npm run our:meta
scripts.our:release:push: git push origin master && git push origin --tags

1.3.4.name: editions
1.3.4.description: Publish multiple editions for your JavaScript packages consistently and easily (e.g. source edition, esnext edition, es2015 edition)

editions.description: Source + ESNext + Require + Flow Type Comments
Babel Compiled + ES2015 + Require

scripts.our:meta: npm run our:meta:docs && npm run our:meta:projectz
scripts.our:verify: npm run our:verify:eslint && npm run our:verify:flow
scripts.our:release: npm run our:release:prepare && npm run our:release:check && npm run our:release:tag && npm run our:release:push
scripts.our:release:prepare: npm run our:clean && npm run our:compile && npm run our:test && npm run our:meta
scripts.our:release:check: npm run our:release:check:changelog && npm run our:release:check:dirty
scripts.our:release:check:changelog: cat ./HISTORY.md | grep v$npm_package_version || (echo add a changelog entry for v$npm_package_version && exit -1)
scripts.our:release:tag: export MESSAGE=$(cat ./HISTORY.md | sed -n "/## v$npm_package_version/,/##/p" | sed 's/## //' | awk 'NR>1{print buf}{buf = $0}') && test "$MESSAGE" || (echo 'proper changelog entry not found' && exit -1) && git tag v$npm_package_version -am "$MESSAGE"
scripts.our:release:push: git push origin master && git push origin --tags

2.0.0.name: editions
2.0.0.description: Publish multiple editions for your JavaScript packages consistently and easily (e.g. source edition, esnext edition, es2015 edition)

editions.description: Source Code in ESNext with Require
Babel Compiled for Node 0.8 with Require

scripts.our:meta: npm run our:meta:docs && npm run our:meta:projectz
scripts.our:release: npm run our:release:prepare && npm run our:release:check && npm run our:release:tag && npm run our:release:push
scripts.our:release:prepare: npm run our:clean && npm run our:compile && npm run our:test && npm run our:meta
scripts.our:release:check: npm run our:release:check:changelog && npm run our:release:check:dirty
scripts.our:release:check:changelog: cat ./HISTORY.md | grep v$npm_package_version || (echo add a changelog entry for v$npm_package_version && exit -1)
scripts.our:release:tag: export MESSAGE=$(cat ./HISTORY.md | sed -n "/## v$npm_package_version/,/##/p" | sed 's/## //' | awk 'NR>1{print buf}{buf = $0}') && test "$MESSAGE" || (echo 'proper changelog entry not found' && exit -1) && git tag v$npm_package_version -am "$MESSAGE"
scripts.our:release:push: git push origin master && git push origin --tags

2.0.1.name: editions
2.0.1.description: Publish multiple editions for your JavaScript packages consistently and easily (e.g. source edition, esnext edition, es2015 edition)

editions.description: esnext source code with require for modules
esnext compiled for browsers with require for modules
esnext compiled for node.js >=0.8 with require for modules

scripts.our:compile:edition: npm run our:compile:edition:browsers && npm run our:compile:edition:node
scripts.our:deploy: echo no need for this project
scripts.our:meta: npm run our:meta:docs && npm run our:meta:projectz
scripts.our:release: npm run our:release:prepare && npm run our:release:check-changelog && npm run our:release:check-dirty && npm run our:release:tag && npm run our:release:push
scripts.our:release:check-changelog: cat ./HISTORY.md | grep v$npm_package_version || (echo add a changelog entry for v$npm_package_version && exit -1)
scripts.our:release:prepare: npm run our:clean && npm run our:compile && npm run our:test && npm run our:meta
scripts.our:release:push: git push origin master && git push origin --tags
scripts.our:release:tag: export MESSAGE=$(cat ./HISTORY.md | sed -n "/## v$npm_package_version/,/##/p" | sed 's/## //' | awk 'NR>1{print buf}{buf = $0}') && test "$MESSAGE" || (echo 'proper changelog entry not found' && exit -1) && git tag v$npm_package_version -am "$MESSAGE"

readme:
editions


Publish multiple editions for your JavaScript packages consistently and easily (e.g. source edition, esnext edition, es2015 edition) ## Discover [Watch the talk.](https://youtu.be/IAB8_UlcNWI) [Get started with the guides and explanations.](https://github.com/bevry/editions/wiki) [View the API documentation.](http://master.editions.bevry.surge.sh/docs/)

History

Discover the release history by heading on over to the HISTORY.md file.

Contribute

Discover how you can contribute by heading on over to the CONTRIBUTING.md file.

Backers

Maintainers

These amazing people are maintaining this project:
  • Benjamin Lupton — view contributions

Sponsors

No sponsors yet! Will you be the first?

Contributors

These amazing people have contributed code to this project:
  • Benjamin Lupton — view contributions
  • Zlatan Vasović — view contributions
Discover how you can contribute by heading on over to the CONTRIBUTING.md file.

License

and licensed under:
